title: Vermillion
description: A realistic VR oil painting studio with tools, color mixing, and lifelike canvas textures.
educational: Great for art classes to explore painting techniques, color theory, and digital studio practice.

title: Open Brush
description: An open-source continuation of Google’s Tilt Brush, allowing 3D brush strokes in space.
educational: Useful for teaching spatial art, VR creativity, and immersive design projects.

title: Painting VR
description: A hands-on VR painting workshop with large-scale canvases and customizable tools.
educational: Allows students to practice painting techniques without materials or mess.

title: Kingspray Graffiti
description: A VR graffiti simulator with realistic spray paint effects and urban backdrops.
educational: Lets students explore street art safely while discussing art history, culture, and expression.

title: SculptrVR
description: A beginner-friendly VR sculpting and voxel modeling tool for creating 3D objects.
educational: Good for introducing students to 3D design, modeling concepts, and creative prototyping.

title: Gravity Sketch
description: A professional 3D design tool for sketching, modeling, and prototyping in VR.
educational: Excellent for design, architecture, and engineering students to collaborate on 3D projects.

title: ShapesXR
description: A collaborative VR prototyping tool for UI/UX and spatial design.
educational: Useful in computer science and design programs for testing user interfaces and team collaboration.

title: Arkio
description: A VR architectural design and planning tool with real-time collaboration.
educational: Architecture students can model buildings, test layouts, and visualize space in VR.

title: Figmin XR
description: A mixed reality creative app for building, animating, and interacting with 3D art.
educational: Encourages students to blend VR and AR by creating interactive MR projects.

title: Sketchfab Viewer (Browser)
description: An online platform to view and interact with 3D models directly in the Quest browser.
educational: Teachers can use 3D artifacts, models, and datasets across history, science, and art lessons.
notes: Use Quest browser; site account optional

title: Nanome
description: A molecular visualization and simulation workspace for exploring proteins, drugs, and materials in VR.
educational: Ideal for chemistry/biology courses to visualize molecular structures and discuss binding or interactions.

title: Sharecare YOU: Anatomy
description: A detailed human anatomy explorer with layered systems and guided lessons.
educational: Great for anatomy and physiology to examine organs, systems, and clinical context in 3D.

title: The Body VR: Journey Inside a Cell
description: A guided trip through the bloodstream and inside a human cell to see cellular processes up close.
educational: Use to introduce cell biology concepts and systems-level thinking with memorable visuals.

title: 3D Organon VR Anatomy (XR Premium)
description: A comprehensive VR anatomy atlas with labeled models, quizzes, and teaching tools.
educational: Supports anatomy labs, self-study, and instructor-led demonstrations with layered system views.

title: Mission: ISS
description: An interactive tour of the International Space Station with tasks and narrated segments.
educational: Great for space science and engineering—connects concepts to real-world habitats and systems.

title: Titans of Space PLUS
description: A guided tour of the solar system comparing planetary sizes, distances, and features.
educational: Perfect for astronomy lessons to reinforce scale, orbits, and planetary science concepts.

title: Apollo 11 VR
description: A cinematic VR recreation of the Apollo 11 mission from pre-launch to moon landing.
educational: Use in history and science to discuss the space race, teamwork, and engineering breakthroughs.

title: Ocean Rift
description: An underwater safari with diverse marine habitats and animal encounters.
educational: Supports biology/ecology lessons on biomes, adaptations, and conservation.

title: Blueplanet VR Explore
description: A collection of photogrammetry sites and landscapes from around the world.
educational: Great for geography, geology, and cultural studies; discuss terrain, history, and preservation.

title: Anne Frank House VR
description: A respectful VR tour of the Secret Annex with historical narration and context.
educational: Facilitates discussions on WWII, tolerance, and human rights with immersive perspective.

title: Wander
description: A Street View-style world explorer for visiting real locations in VR.
educational: Use for virtual field trips, place-based learning, and cultural geography.

title: Mondly: Languages in VR
description: Language learning scenarios with speech recognition and conversational practice.
educational: Supports ESL and language courses with immersive speaking and listening practice.

title: Immerse — Learn Languages in VR
description: Live instructor-led language sessions and social practice environments.
educational: Good for conversational fluency and cultural role-play activities in class.

title: ENGAGE XR
description: A virtual events and education platform for hosting classes, talks, and interactive lessons.
educational: Useful for remote lectures, guest speakers, and multi-class collaborations in VR.

title: Spatial
description: A social 3D platform for exhibits, events, and community spaces.
educational: Host student showcases, poster sessions, and interactive galleries.

title: Immersed
description: A virtual productivity workspace with multi-monitor streaming and team rooms.
educational: Great for focus sessions, research, and remote group work in quiet VR spaces.

title: TRIPP
description: Guided mindfulness and relaxation experiences with visuals and breath cues.
educational: Supports stress management, short wellness breaks, and mental health initiatives on campus.
